Title: Platform Adjustments
Description:
It seems the last of the arcane disruption is up here. 

I'll continue adjusting the ley energies. Use some of the arcana you recovered to dispel the disruptions here.
ObjectivesText: Dispel 3 Unstable Arcane Energies at the top of the Azure Archives.
RewardText: Fine work! I can feel the ley lines beneath this place beginning to heal. We're almost done.
